title: Na Toronto tickets
body: Are these available i live 1hour away i need to go. If so can someone please provide a link.

replies.body:
Tickets aren't available just yet!  From our initial announcement:

>***Tickets***
Tickets sales will begin in late June. Weâ€™ll share more information before tickets go live on Lolesports.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if you have any other questions!
